title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, November 4, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of  Pulitzer Prize winning American poet C.K. Williams (1936) and of humorist, actor, and vaudeville performer Will Rogers (1879).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
